data.description: Examination of current artists' motivations, intentions, and processes and their relationship to general developments in contemporary art.
data.title: CURRENT DIRECTIONS IN ART

data.description: An introduction to a range of digital media techniques for artists and designers, including digital imaging, vector graphics, web design and 3D digital modeling.  Emphasis on creative development along with technical skill building.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO DIGITAL FORMS

data.description: An introduction to time-based art forms including video, installation, and visual art performance.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO VIDEO, PERFORMANCE & INSTALLATION ART

data.description: Principles and techniques in video art.
data.title: ARTIST'S VIDEO

data.description: Seek answers to the fundamental question "What is art?" from multiple perspectives such as historical, theoretical, critical, conceptual, formal, and experiential. Develop visual literacy, sophisticated observational skills and a formal language to assist in the interpretation of objects and experiences in the context of art. Through both theory and practice, develop an understanding of the ways artists arrive at the ideas that inform their creative processes. Includes a survey of developments in art media and looks broadly at art movements, trends and styles throughout history and in varied world cultures.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO ART
